checkerboard.jdk11
Class CheckerViewer

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Canvas
          online.common.exCanvas
              online.game.commonCanvas
                  checkerboard.CheckerGameViewer
                      checkerboard.jdk11.CheckerViewer
All Implemented Interfaces:
CheckerConstants, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.Observer, javax.accessibility.Accessible, lib.DeferredEventHandler, online.common.CanvasProtocol, online.common.OnlineConstants, online.common.PlayConstants, online.game.Play2Constants, online.game.sgf.sgf_names, online.game.ViewerProtocol, online.game.ViewGameProtocol
public class CheckerViewer
extends CheckerGameViewer

notes This is a stub method to contain things needed to adapt to the particular version of java we're run in. This used to be JDK1.02 verses JDK1.1, but we no longer support jdk1.02, so the stuff all went away. We keep the structure because someday there may be some need for compatablity with java 2.x

See Also:
